arguments_schema.description: This action shows a single survey.
arguments_schema.title: Show a Heartbeat survey.

___learnMoreMessage.description: Message to show to the user to learn more

___engagementButtonLabel.description: Text for the engagement button. If specified, this button will be shown instead of rating stars.

___learnMoreUrl.description: URL to show to the user when they click Learn More

___message.description: Message to show to the user

___postAnswerUrl.description: URL to redirect the user to after rating Firefox or clicking the engagement button

___includeTelemetryUUID.description: Include unique user ID in post-answer-url and Telemetry

___thanksMessage.description: Thanks message to show to the user after they've rated Firefox

___surveyId.description: Slug uniquely identifying this survey in telemetry
